name: SSF15
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 15
subtitle: Clinical Staging Procedures Performed
notes:
**Note 1**:  Investigators are interested in determining the  clinical staging procedures used to assign tumors to the T1c category.  Procedures used in clinical staging include digital rectal examination (DRE) and imaging techniques of the prostate.  Imaging includes transrectal ultrasound (TRUS) and endorectal coil magnetic resonance imaging (erMRI).

**Note 2**: Record the procedure(s) used in clinical staging for all T categories regardless of positive or negative findings.  Record TRUS-guided biopsy as imaging.

**Note 3**:  Clinical procedures performed after needle core biopsy or any surgical procedure of the prostate are not included in this field.
rows: No DRE and no imaging performed
DRE only performed, imaging not performed or unknown if performed
Imaging only performed, DRE not performed or unknown if performed

Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
(If this information is required by your standard setter, use of code 988 may result in an edit error.)

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
